title: JCCSS
text1: Jeremy Carter's Computer Service and Sales
text2: Buy a new high quality custom Linux or Windows desktop or laptop computer. Full stack development services available as well.

title: Telephone Sound
text1: Daphne and Jeremy's band, formed in 2013.
text2: The debut album is available here for streaming or digital download purchase. Recorded and produced entirely using free open source software, such as Ardour, ZynAddSubFX, Hydrogen, etc.

title: Defcronyke
text1: Jeremy's solo electronic music project, started in 2006.

title: Audio-Reactive Camera Filter
text1: Visualize your environment through sound. Try it on your cellphone or tablet.
text2: Made with HTML5 Web Audio API and WebGL.

title: Stacktris
text1: A game that's like Tetris, but opposite.

title: Box Hunter
text1: A game where you have to try to get to the black box without breaking it first.

title: Grid Pattern Maker
text2: Cross-platform, made with C++, WxWidgets, and SDL2.

title: Audio Visuals
text1: Visualize your music with this HTML5 audio player.
text2: Made with HTML5 Canvas and Web Audio API.

title: Contrarium
text1: Search for the opposite of what you're looking for.

title: PrettyWeird.ca
text1: Unique apparel for all, by Daphne Volante, the artist who made the background image on this site.
text2: Daphne is the other member of Telephone Sound, and has collaborated on some of the other stuff on this site.

title: Yeoman FountainJS
text1: A client-side web framework that I recommend. This site is made with it.

title: EternalVoid.net
text1: The source code for this website.

title: Pay Jeremy for Work, Donation, or Other
